description: Explore and search fal models to find the right fit for your tasks. Generate content with any model and manage queued runs by checking status, fetching results, and cancelling when needed. Upload files and get shareable URLs for use in your runs.

apiKey.description: Your fal.ai API key (get one at https://fal.ai)

tools.name: models
tools.title: List Models
tools.description: List available models on fal.ai. Use pagination to avoid listing all models at once.

page.description: The page number of models to retrieve (pagination)

total.description: The total number of models to retrieve per page

tools.name: search
tools.title: Search Models
tools.description: Search for models on fal.ai based on keywords

keywords.description: The search terms to find models

tools.name: schema
tools.title: Get Model Schema
tools.description: Get the OpenAPI schema for a specific fal.ai model

tools.name: generate
tools.title: Generate Content
tools.description: Generate content using a fal.ai model. Supports both direct and queued execution.

queue.description: Whether to use the queuing system (default: false)

parameters.description: Model-specific parameters as a JSON object

tools.name: result
tools.title: Get Queue Result
tools.description: Get the result of a queued request using the response_url

url.description: The response_url from a queued request

tools.name: status
tools.title: Check Queue Status
tools.description: Check the status of a queued request using the status_url

url.description: The status_url from a queued request

tools.name: cancel
tools.title: Cancel Queue Request
tools.description: Cancel a queued request using the cancel_url

url.description: The cancel_url from a queued request

tools.name: upload
tools.title: Upload File
tools.description: Upload a file to fal.ai storage and get a CDN URL

path.description: The absolute path to the file to upload
